WorkItem.Description:
A few issues, bear with me if I don't post all the information I need to, I don't write anything more complicated than basic spreadsheets.
 
This occurred when I hit the Clear button on the options tab - it defaulted to Affliction rotation, and I needed to set the destro one.
Edit:  It's also happening any time I try to add to the rotation.  See the second set of error text for that message.
